item.title: Please help me with portforwarding!
item.dc:creator: @_8ballcrazy ~8ballcrazy~
item.description:
@_8ballcrazy wrote:

i am…it wont go up on server status…wich ip do i use to let people log on…

im using this one 67.170.45.131 and ive used drac.no-ip.info neither work…i turned firewall off and everything…,is your server up?

item.title: Please help me with portforwarding!
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Go to command prompt and type in ipconfig, then look at what the : IPv4 address says (the number) then that will be your ip address, then go into your fire wall and turn it off

and click on exceptions, then add port: type in Moparscape as name and port 43594 as port.

Make sure when you click on fire wall you have it off on your router too.

and no you need to make a no-ip go here www.no-ip.com

after you made one , wait 5 mins before you try it and some times people can’t log in from that on there on computer ( like me )

so type in localhost and make sure you have your run server open. Please post if this doesn’t work.

Read full topic
